name: Hive Intelligence
description: Blockchain data is fragmented across different networks and protocols, making it difficult for AI agents to index, access, analyze, and execute on-chain operations. Hive Intelligence solves this by providing a unified API that simplifies the process, making blockchain data accessible and actionable for AI agents in real time. Hive Intelligence is an infrastructure layer for AI agents, providing a unified API for real-time blockchain data. It eliminates data fragmentation, enabling AI agents to query and interact on-chain effortlessly.
